name: homebridge-airquality
description: Homebridge plugin for my custom-built pm2.5 quality sensor
author: Matt Gadda <mgadda@gmail.com>

scripts.generate_types: yarn build && node dist/scripts/generate_types.js ./node_modules/hap-nodejs/lib/gen/HomeKitTypes.js | prettier > types/hap-nodejs/HomeKitType.d.ts
